features.title: Localised for UK users
features.details: Users in the UK should now see tag colours instead of tag colors!

features.title: Grouped Learning Outcomes
features.details: In the summary view, learning outcomes are now grouped by lesson

features.title: iPad Workflow Improvements
features.details: On iPad, you will no longer see a blank screen when opening, allowing you to get to work even quicker!

features.title: Smaller Editing Buttons
features.details: The new buttons for editing were overwhelmingly big on smaller devices.

features.title: Export and Import Lessons
features.details: Export lessons, learning outcomes, and resources as a .classesdoc file.  Share with others or create a backup from settings

features.title: Batch Edit Lessons
features.details: New action buttons for applying actions such as delete and share to multiple lessons at once

features.title: Scroll to Next Lesson
features.details: A new button allows you to quickly jump to your next lesson in the list!

features.title: New Icons for PBL and CBL
features.details: Changed the icons of Problem Based Learning and Case Based Learning lessons to make them less similar

features.title: New Color
features.details: Changed the blue background color to make it look less washed out
